PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-02142019-03-25,  ,  ,  ,  TC
ActTransportation of Dangerous Goods Act, 1992
SubjectRegulations Amending the Transportation of Dangerous Goods Regulations (Containers for Transport of Dangerous Goods by Rail)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TRANSPORTATION OF DANGEROUS GOODS REGULATIONS (CONTAINERS FOR TRANSPORT OF DANGEROUS GOODS BY RAIL) in order to (1) reduce the risks associated with the transportation of toxic inhalation hazard substances by rail; (2) facilitate cross-border trade of dangerous goods and increase safety through better alignment with U.S. and international standards where appropriate; (3) provide more flexibility to stakeholders on the transportation of dangerous goods by rail by allowing new technologies and practices; and (4) consolidate and clarify the requirements to make it easier for stakeholders to retrieve and consult.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0075 Publication Date: 2019-04-03
AttachmentsAttachment
